title: Chapter 1590 - The Sympathy Of A Fellow Sufferer
body:
Chapter 1590 - The Sympathy Of A Fellow Sufferer

Within a grand palace, all manner of piping-hot delicacies were laid out across the table.

But the only diners were Su Yi, Fang Han, Liang Wenyu, and Fang Yourong.

“Fellow Daoist Su, allow me to be the first to offer you a toast.” Liang Wenyu raised his cup and smiled. “You saved Fang Han’s life. Yourong and I will be sure to repay you!”

With that, he drained his cup.

Immediately afterward, Fang Yourong raised her cup. She too was welcoming and respectful.

Su Y raised his cup. He didn’t refuse their toasts.

After several rounds of wine and delicacies, Fang Han suddenly couldn’t take it anymore. “Big Sister, how did you and Big Brother Liang meet?”

Liang Wenyu and Fang Yourong looked at each other and smiled. It seemed they’d been expecting this question.

“Let me tell him.” Fang Yourong’s starry eyes shone with a hint of reminiscence as she told the full story.

Three years ago, after human traffickers sold her into slavery, a heretical cultivator purchased her. He called himself the Azureflame Daoist, and he was the leader of his faction....
original_title: Chapter 1590 - The Sympathy of a Fellow Sufferer
